'''0.2.5_02''' was a server version of [[Java Edition Alpha]] released with client version [[Alpha v1.2.3 04|v1.2.3_04]] on November 26, 2010.<ref>{{link |url=https://notch.tumblr.com/post/1690698977/bug-update-2-more-coming-early-next-week |title=Bug update #2. More coming early next week. |date=November 26, 2010 |website=The Word of Notch}}</ref>

== Fixes ==
* Fixed many multiplayer player respawn bugs.
